item.title: Path of Exile discussion
item.description: /c/Path of Exile discussion on pathofexile-discuss.com [home] [/c/pathofexile ðŸŒŽ] [pathofexile-discuss.com] Description Welcome to pathofexile-discuss, an alternative to https://reddit.com/pathofexile. --- #### Patch Timeline (PDT) **Exilecon Announcement Livestreams**: [July 28-29th](https://www.pathofexile.com/exilecon) **3.21 Ends**: Mid-August (Predicted) --- [Stash tab sales usually occur every 3 weeks.](https://poedb.tw/us/shop?n=Premium+Stash+Tab+Bundle) --- #### [Path of Exile Discord!](https://discord.gg/pathofexile) #### [Path of Exile Trading Discord](http://discord.gg/VxcYmmN) --- #### Rules * Just be nice :) * [Path of Exile Terms of Use] (https://www.pathofexile.com/legal/terms-of-use-and-privacy-policy) ---
